roleset.name: emitting high-pitched continuous sound

roles.note: verb frame's arg1 split into 2 args here, in case both appear (the whine and its subject matter).

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Or how about his whining that the wealthy are being “squeezed” and “abused” while saying the minimum wage needs to reduced immediately.
example.arg: that the wealthy are being "squeezed" and "abused"
while saying the minimum wage needs to be reduced immediately

example.name: args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: John annoyed Mary with all his whining "WHY ME!" about the traffic ticket.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, whine.01. Corresponds to VNcls animal_sounds-38, complain-37.8, manner_speaking-37.3, sound_emission-43.2.
